opening_theme: #1: "Oyome-san ni Natte Agenaizo (お嫁さんになってあげないゾ)" by Kaori Moritani (eps 1-24)
#2: "Body Dake Ready (ボディーだけレディー)" by Junko Uchida (eps 25-60)
#3: "Yumemiru Jikan 夢みる時間" by Megumi Mori (eps 61-86)
#4: "Hajimete no Chuu (はじめてのチュウ)" by Anshin Papa (eps 87-108)
#5: "Suimin Busoku (すいみん不足)" by Chicks (eps 109-170)
#6: "Oryouri Koushinkyoku (お料理行進曲)" by Yuka (eps 171-331)
ending_theme: #1: "Magical Boy Magical Heart (マジカルBoy マジカルHeart)" by Kaori Moritani (eps 1-16)
#2: "Lace no Cardigan (レースのカーディガン)" by Kaori Sakagami (eps 17-24)
#4: "Felt no Pencase (フェルトのペンケース)" by Megumi Mori (eps 61-86)
#5: "Merry ha tada no Tomodachi" by Toshiko Fujita (eps 87-108)
#6: "Hajimete no Chuu (はじめてのチュウ)" by Anshin Papa (あんしんパパ) (eps 109-170, 213-290, 311-331)
#8: "Uwasa no Kiss (うわさのキッス)" by TOKIO (eps 291-310)
